entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 70%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
